app.name: cliques
app.query: WITH licitantes_dim_habilitado as ( select distinct num_documento from postgres_olap_lins.dim_licitacao_habilitado where length(num_documento) = 14), licitantes_e_socios as ( select A.num_documento as licitante, B.cpf_cnpj_socio as socio from licitantes_dim_habilitado A inner join dataset.rfb_cnpj_201905_socios B on (A.num_documento = B.cnpj)), socios_pj as (select distinct socio as cnpj_nos from licitantes_e_socios where (length(socio) = 14)), uniao_licitantes_e_socios as (select licitante as cnpj_nos from licitantes_e_socios union select cnpj_nos as cnpj_nos from socios_pj), uniao_licitantes_e_socios_c_rfb_soc as (select A.cnpj_nos as cnpj_nos, B.cpf_cnpj_socio as socio from uniao_licitantes_e_socios A join  dataset.rfb_cnpj_201905_socios B on (A.cnpj_nos = B.cnpj)) ( select A.cnpj_nos cnpj1, B.cnpj_nos cnpj2 from uniao_licitantes_e_socios_c_rfb_soc A join uniao_licitantes_e_socios_c_rfb_soc B where (A.socio = B.socio) and (A.cnpj_nos != B.cnpj_nos) )
